After 500 hours i can confidently say its an ok game.

not the best but ok.

Still stuck at silver 1 and probably will forever be but that is ok.

However at times i feel like this game can be questionable on what is a fair shot or not, maybe its just me being bad, but at times i do feel like i got robbed or got a headshot i was not supposed to get.

DO NOT SPEND A SINGLE PENNY FOR THIS GAME!

This game is broken as fu.ck.
-The "killer-vision" not only working randomly.
-shots are not connecting when you are aiming (and shooting) the enemy
-the netcode is horrible(in game lags)
-there were hackers in every wingman match I played (I even own prime)
-the economy is fuc.king broken as well (online casino)
-ranking system of dangerzone(the battle royale mode) is broken af(you get demoted even when you didn't even play the game for a day ).
Moreover sometimes you get alot of kills like 9 or so and you performed very well in a match and you still get demoted.
guys, how to participate in champion for csgo  with my team??
